snippet: The show was not given a full run, but the shorter run will be enough to guarantee the comedy continues to make profits for its owner in sales in syndication - NBC.
abstract: The show was not given a full run, but the shorter run will be enough to guarantee the comedy continues to make profits for its owner in sales in syndication - NBC.

headline.main: '30 Rock' Will Return, but Only for 13 Episodes, NBC Says
